humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states 'PART I RIGHT SENTINEL NODE, BIOPSY: LYMPH NODE (1), NEGATIVE FOR TUMOR BY STEP SECTION AND CYTOKERATIN STAIN.' This indicates that there is no metastatic carcinoma in the sentinel lymph node, which according to New Rule 10 and New Rule 11, corresponds to N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report does not mention any metastasis to the axillary lymph nodes (e.g., 'N1: Metastasis in 1-3 axillary lymph nodes'), so the N stage for this patient is N0.
